text:
Amb's Poverty Vegetarian Chili Mac & Cheese

Ingredients:
1 onion
3-4 cloves garlic
vegetable oil
1 "big spoonful" of flour
1 "big spoonful" of chili powder

"the shit:"
3 cans of beans
  1 red
  1 light red kidney
  1 black
1/2 carton thingy of vegetable broth (but chicken broth/stock works too)
1 bag of frozen corn
1 jar of pasta sauce
1 can of diced tomatoes & green chiles (rotel)

some pasta
a bag of shredded cheddar

Directions:
1. chop up the onion & garlic, mince/dice/whatever, saute in big big big big big pot with oil
2. Add the flour & chili powder and make a good base for the shit
3. throw "the shit" in there
4. cook that mother trucker for like 10 minutes i guess? i dunno. get it hot & bubbly.
5. add the pasta & cook using the box time listed + 2 minutes
6. add the entire bag of shredded cheddar and mix. forever.
7. you did it! add some salt, pepper, and cholula hot sauce and enjoy. feeds 6-8 or 1 person for like, a week lol
title: Amb's Poverty Vegetarian Chili Mac & Cheese
